ModMetaData.name: KCSG Unbound
ModMetaData.author: TOAST7312
ModMetaData.description:
Removes the 65,535 symbol limit in KCSG (Krypt's Custom Structure Generation) system, enabling unlimited structure generation for RimWorld.
KCSG Unbound enhances the original KCSG system while maintaining backward compatibility with existing mods. It provides a robust foundation for creating complex, detailed structures without worrying about symbol limitations.
Features: - Unlimited structure symbols - Enhanced symbol resolvers - RimWorld 1.5 compatibility - Full backward compatibility with existing KCSG-based mods
For developers: - Extend SymbolResolver_KCSG for custom symbol resolvers - Register unlimited symbols through SymbolRegistry - Fully documented API with examples
GitHub: https://github.com/TOAST7312/KCSG-Unbound
